tasks.title: Master Angular Framework
tasks.summary: Gain proficiency in Angular by learning its core concepts, including components, services, routing, and state management, with hands-on examples.

tasks.title: Develop First Prototype of Online Shop
tasks.summary: Create a basic prototype for the online shop, including product listing, cart functionality, and a simple checkout process.

tasks.title: Create Project Issue Template
tasks.summary: Design a clear and structured issue template for tracking bugs, feature requests, and tasks, ensuring efficient project management.

tasks.title: Document Project Architecture and Workflow
tasks.summary: Write comprehensive documentation covering the project architecture, code structure, and workflow to assist current and future team members.

tasks.title: Prepare Final Project Presentation
tasks.summary: Prepare a detailed presentation for stakeholders, showcasing the projectâ€™s development, key features, and future roadmap.

tasks.title: Set Up Project Repository
tasks.summary: Create and initialize a Git repository for the project, set up branches for development, and configure basic CI/CD pipelines.

tasks.title: Develop User Authentication System
tasks.summary: Build a secure user authentication system with login, registration, and password recovery functionality.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive UI Design
tasks.summary: Create a responsive user interface using CSS Grid and Flexbox to ensure the app is fully functional on all screen sizes.

tasks.title: Implement Product Search Feature
tasks.summary: Add a search functionality to the online shop, allowing users to filter products by category, price, and keywords.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests for Core Functions
tasks.summary: Develop unit tests for critical functions, including user registration, login, and product search, to ensure code quality.

tasks.title: Prepare User Manual
tasks.summary: Create a user manual that explains how to use the online shop, including instructions for browsing products and checking out.

tasks.title: Implement Payment Gateway Integration
tasks.summary: Integrate a payment gateway (e.g., Stripe or PayPal) to process payments for the online shop.

tasks.title: Optimize Frontend Performance
tasks.summary: Optimize the frontend by implementing lazy loading, code splitting, and image optimization to improve performance and reduce load times.

tasks.title: Conduct Usability Testing
tasks.summary: Conduct usability testing with a group of users to identify pain points in the user experience and improve the design.

tasks.title: Prepare API Documentation
tasks.summary: Write API documentation for all endpoints, including authentication, product listings, and checkout, for both internal and external developers.

tasks.title: Design Project Marketing Strategy
tasks.summary: Develop a marketing strategy for the online shop, including social media campaigns, SEO optimization, and paid advertising.

tasks.title: Implement Order History Feature
tasks.summary: Create an order history feature where customers can view past purchases, track orders, and reorder items.

tasks.title: Set Up Analytics Tracking
tasks.summary: Implement analytics tracking to measure user behavior, conversion rates, and other important metrics using tools like Google Analytics.

tasks.title: Ensure GDPR Compliance
tasks.summary: Review and update the online shop to ensure compliance with GDPR regulations regarding user data privacy and security.

tasks.title: Finalize Launch Plan
tasks.summary: Create a comprehensive launch plan, including timelines, promotional activities, and support strategies for the online shop's official release.

tasks.title: Add Pagnitor To Shipping Project
tasks.summary: Add paginator to materials page for easier navigation
